text:
EOD 01/06/2023
How did the day go?
• Add some documentation for Metabase; Not completed
• Calls with eGov IT for getting Azure account; On hold from eGov IT
• Interviewed candidates for Hub admin roles in Assam and Meghalaya

EOD 09/06/2023 ^@care_engineering

How did the day go?
• Made Netmaker (self-hosted) work as an alternative to cloudflare tunnel.
◦ Hosted a middleware; Camera feed and vitals are accessible from Care
◦ Next week's task would be adding secondary hosts for production spoke servers to slowly rollout the changes.
• Shared scripts for GH Aland spoke with Nagnath
What's Next?
• Follow-ups - Cloud billing accounts from eGov; Billing issues; Budget issues for staging.
• Deploy-preview
• Terraform

EOD 12/06/2023 ^@care_engineering
Done:
• Updated terraform code to correct service account issues; added NAT component.
• worked on removing nginx server info from responses.
To Do:
• Update terraform to add outputs.

EOD 03/07/2023 ^@care_engineering

How did the day go?
• Meeting with Prof Ayushi on metrics in Dashboard. Meeting concluded on topics to improve and decided to have 3 subsequent meetings to improve the metrics on metabase dashboard.
• Meeting with Deepjyothi to offload some documentation on Networking of Spokes. Explained expectations and shared existing docs.
• Follow ups with Harish/Manish to get Azure account details corrected for Billing related issues.
• Attended Weekly Hub Admin call; Cleared some issues for Gayan.
Whats Next?
• Metabase dashboard
◦ Categorize items to hospital view, cluster view, state view; Make field filter work for Hospital Names.
• Clear invoices for last month.

EOD 04/07/2023 ^@care_engineering

How did the day go?
• Call with Gayan regarding reports and Metabase dashboard.
• Follow up calls with Harish to resolve Azure billing Issues.
• Clearing cloud bills for previous month.
What's Next?
• Metabase dashboard v3 (with State View, Cluster View, Hospital View)
• Clear out a few small tasks, and do some followups.
• Look into whats new with Sunbird.

EOD 05/07/2023 ^@care_engineering

How did the day go?
• Updated SSL for Sikkim instance
• Cleared cloud bills, prepared reimbursement form, drafted email
• a few short calls for troubleshooting issues.
What's next?
• Try metabase sync made by @U02T4HFA07Q
• Make new dashboards
• Look into Sunbird Obsrv

EOD 06/07/2023 ^@care_engineering

How did the day go?
• Meeting with Sanketika team for a demo of Sunbird Obsrv.
• Done Metabase changes requested by Gayan.
• Troubleshot issues with Plexus Care instance. Upgraded the instance because it was under-provisioned.
• Fixed issue with Maps on care.ohc.network.
• Offloaded a Ops documentation to James.
• Call with Naganath for clearing concerns on Mesh Network setup in Hubli. Send an email explaining steps with diagram.
What's Next?
• Metabase dashboard V3. The dashboard needs to have a hospital filter and a date filter.

EOD 07/07/2023 ^@care_engineering

How did the day go?
• Added changes to metabase items to add a Field Filter for hospital names.
• Meeting with Prof. Ayushi and Ops team regd. Metabase dashboard.
• Assisted Hubli Hub Admin to update LAN network.
• Fixed minor issues of redirection and CORS updates in staging.
• Couple of emails and followups on procurement and billing.
What's next?
• Collate requirements from Dashboard discussion meeting, review and file issues.
• Metabase dashboard updates.
• Clear out some of the quick and easy tasks.
• Checkout Whisper for deployment.

EOD 10/07/2023 ^@care_engineering

How did the day go?
• The day was mostly working with Naganath to connect SmartICU Adaptors to new mesh network.
• Deployed care instance for hcx troubleshoot and demo.
• Monday Meetings.
What's next?
• Reports in Metabase
